group_1.textLeft: Wow! This is amazing!
I've never seen anything like this in Hozuki!

group_1.textRight: Because no one in the world has caught up@to me!

group_1.textLeft: This design...what is this...?

group_1.textRight: It's a spring-summer-fall-winter outfit.@The concept is that you can wear it all year round.

group_1.textLeft: How sensible!
Oh, the accessories over here are cute too.

group_1.textRight: Ah, I'm glad to hear that, I'm really proud@of those ones.

group_1.textLeft: You make accessories too?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I also teach workshops on accessories.

group_1.textLeft: Wow! Amazing!
If you teach me, could I make them too?

group_1.textRight: Sure, anybody should be able to do it.

group_1.textLeft: Woooow!
...By the way, Kanoko...for a while now...
You've been glancing at the Hon-shimeji a lot,@haven't you?
Glance, and glance, then glance...
That scrunchie was originally your work...
And I got the Hon-shimeji thanks to you, so...
Would you like to have it?
But, I'm sure it would be happy to be eaten@by somebody who likes it so much...

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I think that's what the shimeji is saying@too.

group_1.textLeft: You could hear it, huh...

group_1.textRight: Hmm, but it's not right to just take it from you.
Why don't I make accessories for you?

group_1.textLeft: Is that okay?!

group_1.textRight: You've been interested in those for a while,@haven't you?

group_1.textLeft: Thank you!
Hee hee, this time the mushroom has turned@into an accessory!
